thread.title: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes
thread.title_full: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes

author: Shelli Weinstein, TV GUIDE
title: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes
text:
Philip Winchester, The Player | Photo Credits: Colleen Hayes/NBC Philip Winchester, The Player | Photo Credits: Colleen Hayes/NBC Photo: 2015 NBCUniversal Media, LLC Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
The game has been cut short: NBC has trimmed The Player 's original episode order from 13 to 9 for its first season, Deadline reports. 
The news comes after the drama saw its first ratings growth last week, rising to a 0.8 among adults 18-49 and 4.14 total viewers. 
The Player stars Philip Winchester as Alex Kane , a private security specialist in Las Vegas who finds himself drawn into a high-stakes conspiracy involving the world's richest people gambling on crime. Wesley Snipes stars as "the pit boss" and Charity Wakefield as "the dealer." 
The Player airs Thursdays at 10/9c on NBC. Are you upset by the news?
